## Point.floatField() method

Adds a number field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
floatField(name: string, value: number | any): Point;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | field name |
|  value | number \| any | field value |
